org.openimaj.io.wrappers

Class ReadWritableIndependentPair<A,B>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.util.pair.IndependentPair<A,B>
      • org.openimaj.io.wrappers.ReadWritableIndependentPair<A,B>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - Type of first object
    B - Type of second object
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadableBinary, ReadWriteableBinary, WriteableBinary

    public abstract class ReadWritableIndependentPair<A,B>
extends IndependentPair<A,B>
implements ReadWriteableBinary
    Base class for writing any independent pair.
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
